channel.title: SCAR boards scrapped for Simba
channel.description:
Today I finished setting up an automated build system for Simba, the open-source SCAR replacement developed by our friends over at villavu.com, and so the admins and I thought it was time to retire the old SCAR boards for the successor, Simba.
For more info:
[url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,456714.0.html]What is Simba?[/url] [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,456711.0.html]Download Simba Free Here![/url]
A big thanks to Wizzup? and the rest of the Simba devs who made this possible!

item.title: SCAR boards scrapped for Simba
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:11, topic:360297”][quote author=cruel link=topic=456728.msg3369561#msg3369561 date=1287104728]
An archiving would’ve been better.
I was just looking for an old script and SCAR tutorial. But whatever.
[/quote]

It is archived, you have to enable it under your profile options. Then you can see both the Aryan and SCAR boards.[/quote]

What he said^ If you can’t figure it out, I can give you links.

Read full topic

item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

Radeon:

Even if the old scripts work with simba, would they work with runescape?

Most of the SCAR scripts were horribly outdated… So no, I don’t think they would? Maybe with a little tweaking though

item.title: SCAR boards scrapped for Simba
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

I am all for this change, Simba is pretty good. But why did you make a whole 10 board sections for it?

Read full topic

item.title: SCAR boards scrapped for Simba
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:2, topic:360297”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=456728.msg3342717#msg3342717 date=1284517327]
Today I finished setting up an automated build system for Simba, the open-source SCAR replacement developed by our friends over at villavu.com, and so the admins and I thought it was time to retire the old SCAR boards for the successor, Simba.

For more info:

What is Simba?
Download Simba Free Here!

A big thanks to Wizzup? and the rest of the Simba devs who made this possible!
[/quote]

many of those scripts worked with simba.[/quote]
Decided to go for a fresh start seeing as it’s a ‘new era’, in a sense. Simba isn’t windows-only, it isn’t closed source, and the scripts aren’t going to be pascal-only soon enough either.

That’s a pretty big change. It deserves better than being thrown in indiscriminately with the old SCAR stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: SCAR boards scrapped for Simba
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

many of those scripts worked with simba.

I was aware of that, but we decided it would be best to have a fresh start.

If you want to see the old SCAR boards then you can go here:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


And join the ‘View Archived Boards’ group at the bottom of your screen.

Read full topic
